actions.description: 11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) acid damage.
actions.name: Lashing Maw

actions.description: 13 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) psychic damage.
actions.name: Psychic Orb

actions.description: The emissary polymorphs into a Small or Medium creature of its choice or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.
actions.name: Change Shape

actions.description: The emissary makes a Psychic Orb attack.
actions.name: Psychic Orb

actions.description: The emissary teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it and can make a Lashing Maw attack.
actions.name: Teleportation Maw (Costs 2 Actions)

actions.description: The emissary targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it and psychically lashes at that creature's mind. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or take 36 (8d8) psychic damage and be stunned until the start of its next turn.
actions.name: Psychic Lash (Costs 3 Actions)

specialTraits.description: When the emissary drops to 0 hit points, its body melts away. A greater star spawn emissary instantly appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of where the lesser emissary disappeared. The greater emissary uses the lesser emissary's initiative count.
specialTraits.name: Aberrant Rejuvenation

specialTraits.description: If the emissary fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: The emissary doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature
